name: Konstantin Stark
aboutMeText: Hi, I'm a developer from near Bayreuth. For me, programming is more than just technology – it often requires creativity. I look for solutions that work while also opening up new approaches. My goal is to create practical results that leave a lasting impact.
location: In the Kulmbach and Bayreuth districts, I am flexible, but I am most effective remotely, as I can shape my work style and environment ideally there.
personality: Open-minded, enthusiastic, and creative – the personality type 'ENFP' describes me well.
challenge: Open to new challenges and constantly looking for ways to expand my knowledge and skills.
projectDescription: Explore a selection of my work – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_1: Jump, run, and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and Tabasco sauce to fight the crazy chicken.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_2: Task manager based on the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop features, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_3: A simple library based on the PokéAPI that provides and catalogs Pokemon information.

skillsDescription: Throughout my journey, I've worked on various projects and gained knowledge in frontend technologies and expertise. I enjoy trying out new tools and methods to improve and keep up with the fast-paced world of web development.
contactPrompt: Feel free to contact me. I want to expand my skills.
problemToSolve: Is there a problem to solve?
contactFormDescription: Contact me through this form, I’m interested in hearing your ideas and contributing to your projects.
nameMissing: Oops! Your name seems to be missing
whatToDevelop: What would you like to develop?
privacyText2: and I agree to the processing of my data as described.
